articles.title: This extinct marine predator started out as a small tadpole-seal hybrid with weird teeth
articles.description: Ichthyosaurs were the main predators of the oceans millions of years ago. But early ichthyosaurs were much different, with all the signs of awkward growing pains, according to a funky-looking fossil described in a new study.
